DataElement.preferredName: FACT-G Questionnaire Version 4 GP1 How True Past Seven Days Lack Energy Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how true in the past 7 days they had a lack of energy, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: FACT-G Questionnaire Seven Past Day Lacks Energy How True Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A general quality of life instrument intended for use with a variety of chronic illness conditions. A core instrument in the Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy (FACIT) Measurement System, a system which has multiple disease-, treatment-, and condition-specific subscales to complement the FACT-G._A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one._Before the present time._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._A question about whether an individual has or had a lack of energy._A question about an individual's agreement with a statement._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A general quality of life instrument intended for use with a variety of chronic illness conditions. A core instrument in the Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy (FACIT) Measurement System, a system which has multiple disease-, treatment-, and condition-specific subscales to complement the FACT-G.

Concepts.definition: A general quality of life instrument intended for use with a variety of chronic illness conditions. A core instrument in the Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy (FACIT) Measurement System, a system which has multiple disease-, treatment-, and condition-specific subscales to complement the FACT-G.

Property.preferredName: Seven Past Day Lack Energy How True Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.:Before the present time.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.:A survey question about whether a person has experienced a lack of energy.:A survey question about a personÂ¿s agreement with a statement.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
A question about whether an individual has or had a lack of energy.
A question about an individual's agreement with a statement.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DECs released per approval of model owner. mc 10/26/10 Updated concept definition C91781 to remove special characters for MDR data migration. 3.5.20 mc

ValueDomain.preferredName: Past 7 Days How True Score_5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of how true in the past 7 days a person experienced something about a their illness using a five-point Likert scale.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated definition to match NCIt. mc 9/8/20

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created new version to correct Low/High value. mc 10/24/12
